trans-unit.source: All releases are signed with the gpg key 4D8592DF4CE1ED31.
trans-unit.target: All releases are signed with the gpg key 4D8592DF4CE1ED31.

trans-unit.source: Passlib is a password hashing library for Python 2 & 3, which provides cross-platform implementations of over 30 password hashing algorithms, as well as a framework for managing existing password hashes. It’s designed to be useful for a wide range of tasks, from verifying a hash found in /etc/shadow, to providing full-strength password hashing for multi-user applications.
trans-unit.target: Passlib is a password hashing library for Python 2 & 3, which provides cross-platform implementations of over 30 password hashing algorithms, as well as a framework for managing existing password hashes. It’s designed to be useful for a wide range of tasks, from verifying a hash found in /etc/shadow, to providing full-strength password hashing for multi-user applications.

trans-unit.source: See the homepage for the latest news and more information.
trans-unit.target: See the homepage for the latest news and more information.

trans-unit.source: See the documentation for details, installation instructions, and examples.
trans-unit.target: See the documentation for details, installation instructions, and examples.

trans-unit.source: See the changelog for a description of what’s new in Passlib.
trans-unit.target: See the changelog for a description of what’s new in Passlib.

trans-unit.source: comprehensive password hashing framework supporting over 30 schemes
trans-unit.target: Un marco completo de cifrado de contraseñas que soporta más de 30 esquemas
